page.title: 15HUMBIE'S SPECIAL SCHOOL
page.content: IN HUMBIE WE HAVE A CHILDRENS VILLAGE WITH LOTS OF LITTLE HOUSES GROUPED TOGETHER.IT IS A SCHOOL FOR CHILDREN WHO ARE MENTALLY HANDICAPPED.SOME CHILDREN GO EVERY DAY WHILE OTHERS LIVE THERE.GROWN UPS AT THE CHILDRENS VILLAGE TEACH AND LOOK AFTER THE CHILDREN THERE.IT USED TO BE A HOLIDAY PLACE FOR POOR CHILDREN FROM EDINBURGH.THEY CAME TO LIVE THERE FOR A FEW WEEKS AND CAME TO OUR SCHOOL.WE HAVE A BOOK WITH THE NAMES OF ALL THE CHILDREN AND THE SCHOOLS THEY CAME FROM.IT WAS BOUGHT BY A RELIGIOUS GROUP SEVERAL YEARS AGO WHO WANTED TO RUN A SCHOOL FOR MONGOL CHILDREN.SOME OF THOSE FIRST CHILDREN HAVE LIVED THERE EVER SINCE AND ARE NOW ADULTS.
